name: generate_flow_diagram
description: Generate a Mermaid diagram representing processes, workflows, sequences, or relationships from the content. Supports flowcharts, sequence diagrams, state diagrams, ER diagrams, and more.

mermaid_syntax.description: Valid Mermaid diagram syntax. Must start with diagram type declaration (graph, flowchart, sequenceDiagram, stateDiagram-v2, erDiagram, pie, gantt, classDiagram, etc.)

diagram_type.description: The type of Mermaid diagram being generated

title.description: A short descriptive title for the diagram (max 10 words)

description.description: A brief explanation of what the diagram represents (1-2 sentences)
